PROGRAM NAME UNKNOWN: an error was detected while setting the parameters:
      Final Checks
            you have chosen conflicting types of help: Param: help (at supplied
            parameters:1: -help), Param: help-groups-in-list (at supplied
            parameters:3: -help-groups-in-list test-group1)

For help with the correct use of the parameters and to see which parameters are
available please use the '-help' parameter which will print a usage message
